item.title: Get 2016 Off To A Blazing Start!
item.dc:creator: Aaron Tylor
item.description:
Hey there digital marketers, don’t let your content slip up this year. We tell you the top priorities for all content specialists! Invest some time and energy into these 4 resolutions and don’t listen to the cynics. Remember: People who make resolutions are 10 times more likely to achieve their goals than people who don’t […]

The post Get 2016 Off To A Blazing Start! appeared first on Search Berg.
item.content:encoded:
Hey there digital marketers, don’t let your content slip up this year. We tell you the top priorities for all content specialists! Invest some time and energy into these 4 resolutions and don’t listen to the cynics. Remember: People who make resolutions are 10 times more likely to achieve their goals than people who don’t bother with them.

What do you say? Let’s hit the ground running and be a better digital marketer in 2016!

The post Get 2016 Off To A Blazing Start! appeared first on Search Berg.
